Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 17, 2025

Karl Golf GIR ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Karl Golf GIR.

1. Information We Collect

A. Account Information

When you create an account, we collect your Name and Email Address. This is used solely to identify you and store your golf statistics securely.

B. Location Data

Our app collects Location Data (GPS coordinates) to:

  • Calculate distances to the green while on the golf course.
  • Identify which golf course you are playing.

This location data is used for app functionality. It is not shared with third parties for marketing purposes.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
  • Create and maintain your user account.
  • Track your golf statistics (Greens in Regulation, Scores, etc.).

3. Data Security

We implement security measures designed to protect your information. All data is transmitted over secure HTTPS connections.

4. Data Deletion

You have the right to request deletion of your data. You can delete your account and all associated data directly within the app by going to Dashboard > Delete Account.

5. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
